name: Mini Jam: Frogs-Submission
description:
Best played with controller or keyboard! Only the most patient and calm individuals should attempt with touch controls!

Controls (Keyboard Controls)

A (Z on Keyboard)Interact/JumpB (X on Keyboard) Hold Down/Release for High JumpD-Pad(Arrow Keys)Move

Help the Princess and get to the top of the Castle to rescue her before the Dragon gets her but watch out for those small platforms under your feet!

I didn't get a chance to get everything in before the end of the jam, but I will be going back and finishing this game! Thank you for playing!
